fields.name: downloadUrl
fields.title: downloadUrl
fields.description: If the file can be downloaded, URL to download the binary.

fields.name: softwareRequirements
fields.title: softwareRequirements
fields.description: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).

fields.name: permissions
fields.title: permissions
fields.description: Permission(s) required to run the app (for example, a mobile app may require full internet access or may run only on wifi).

fields.name: processorRequirements
fields.title: processorRequirements
fields.description: Processor architecture required to run the application (e.g. IA64).

fields.name: availableOnDevice
fields.title: availableOnDevice
fields.description: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.

fields.name: featureList
fields.title: featureList
fields.description: Features or modules provided by this application (and possibly required by other applications).

fields.name: applicationSubCategory
fields.title: applicationSubCategory
fields.description: Subcategory of the application, e.g. 'Arcade Game'.

fields.name: device
fields.title: device
fields.description: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.

fields.name: applicationCategory
fields.title: applicationCategory
fields.description: Type of software application, e.g. 'Game, Multimedia'.

fields.name: softwareVersion
fields.title: softwareVersion
fields.description: Version of the software instance.

fields.name: storageRequirements
fields.title: storageRequirements
fields.description: Storage requirements (free space required).

fields.name: applicationSuite
fields.title: applicationSuite
fields.description: The name of the application suite to which the application belongs (e.g. Excel belongs to Office).

fields.name: memoryRequirements
fields.title: memoryRequirements
fields.description: Minimum memory requirements.

fields.name: screenshot
fields.title: screenshot
fields.description: A link to a screenshot image of the app.

fields.name: countriesSupported
fields.title: countriesSupported
fields.description: Countries for which the application is supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

fields.name: softwareHelp
fields.title: softwareHelp
fields.description: Software application help.

fields.name: softwareAddOn
fields.title: softwareAddOn
fields.description: Additional content for a software application.

fields.name: releaseNotes
fields.title: releaseNotes
fields.description: Description of what changed in this version.

fields.name: supportingData
fields.title: supportingData
fields.description: Supporting data for a SoftwareApplication.

fields.name: requirements
fields.title: requirements
fields.description: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).

fields.name: countriesNotSupported
fields.title: countriesNotSupported
fields.description: Countries for which the application is not supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

fields.name: operatingSystem
fields.title: operatingSystem
fields.description: Operating systems supported (Windows 7, OSX 10.6, Android 1.6).

fields.name: fileSize
fields.title: fileSize
fields.description: Size of the application / package (e.g. 18MB). In the absence of a unit (MB, KB etc.), KB will be assumed.

fields.name: installUrl
fields.title: installUrl
fields.description: URL at which the app may be installed, if different from the URL of the item.
